comment: He's not very familiar with the material, makes it hard to understand concepts because he learns them with you. Nice guy though
Useless class, attendance is mandatory and pointless as all he does is read over power points that are posted on vista so it becomes annoying.

Ken Sukdikas SHOULD NOT be teaching. He's your typical PowerPoint regurgitator, and his inexperience is utterly obvious. He talks too fast, and his exam reviews are littered wit careless errors. For what I pay KSU I expect a much better value for my money. I had better instructors than this hack back in community college. FAIL.
